types1:Item.types1:Name: Process_AddressChanged_Detail-1
types1:Item.types1:Description: Updates BP Address and Creates BP Roles if missing

process.name: Process_AddressChanged_Detail-1
process.description: Updates BP Address and Creates BP Roles if missing

subflow.title: Extend BP to new Customer Company
Extend BP to new Sales Area

operation.expression:
let $bpa_cr := $output.out_Patch_A_BusinessPartnerAddress[1]/Error ,$bpa_ch := $output.out_PostBPAddressStatus[1]/Reason ,$cc := $output.out_ProcessVariables_POST_A_CustomerCompany[1]/Error ,$sa := $output.out_ProcessVariables_POST_A_CustomerSalesArea[1]/Error (:,$em := $output.out_ProcessVariables_EmailAddressChanged[1]/Error:) return
(if ($output.out_AddressExist = "YES") then '^PATCH_A_BusinessPartnerAddress='||$bpa_ch (:||'^EmailAddressChanged_Detail='||$em :) else '^POST_A_BusinessPartnerAddress='||$bpa_cr) ||
(if ($temp.tmp_Flag_ExtendToCompany = 1 ) then '^POST_A_CustomerCompany='||$cc/Error|| '^POST_A_CustomerSalesArea='||$sa/Error else '')

let $bpa_cr := $output.out_Patch_A_BusinessPartnerAddress[1]/Description ,$bpa_ch := $output.out_PostBPAddressStatus[1]/Detail ,$cc := $output.out_ProcessVariables_POST_A_CustomerCompany[1]/Description ,$sa := $output.out_ProcessVariables_POST_A_CustomerSalesArea[1]/Description (:,$em := $output.out_ProcessVariables_EmailAddressChanged[1]/Description:) return
(if ($output.out_AddressExist = "YES") then '^PATCH_A_BusinessPartnerAddress='||$bpa_ch (:||'^EmailAddressChanged_Detail='||$em :) else '^POST_A_BusinessPartnerAddress='||$bpa_cr) ||
(if ($temp.tmp_Flag_ExtendToCompany = 1 ) then '^POST_A_CustomerCompany='||$cc/Error|| '^POST_A_CustomerSalesArea='||$sa/Error else '')
